summary.description: A summarized version of the given log

rootCause.description: The identified root cause of the issue in the log

evidence.description: Lines from the log that support the identified root cause

line.description: A specific line from the log

reason.description: Explanation of why this line is relevant to the root cause

fixSuggestions.description: Suggested fixes to resolve the identified issue

confidence.description: A confidence score (0.0 to 1.0) indicating the certainty of the root cause identification

nextSteps.description: Recommended next steps for further investigation or resolution
